entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 1 "The Little Prince"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 1 "The Little Prince"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever been picked on by someone bigger or older than you? Did you have someone who could protect you? Prince Joash did.
"Love each other like brothers and sisters". ROMANS 12;10, ICB.
In God's family, we love and protect each other.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 2 "Repairing The Temple"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 2 "Repairing The Temple"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever helped with a family project such as washing windows or weeding a flower garden? Joash led his country in a big church project. And everyone worked together.
"Work together as a team for the faith". PHILIPPIANS 1:27, ICB.
In God's family, we work together.
For the PDF, visit www.gracelink.net/kindergarten
Or download the iphone/ipad or Android app: keyword "Sabbath School"

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 3 "Queen Esther"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 3 "Queen Esther"
media:group.media:description:
Who do you stay with when you can't be with your parents? Esther's cousin cared for her for a long time.
"Keep on loving each other as brothers". HEBREWS 13:1, NIV.
God's people care for each other.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 4 "Esther Saves Her People"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 4 "Esther Saves Her People"
media:group.media:description:
Do you pray with your family at home? Queen Esther prayed with her maids in the palace. Lots of other people were praying with her too.
"Where two or three come together in my name, there am I with them" MATTHEW 18:20, NIV.
God hears us when we pray together

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 5 "The Little Maid"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 5 "The Little Maid"
media:group.media:description:
Do you have work that you do to help at home? Do you help at Grandma's house? at the park? at the baby-sitter's? Little Maid helped too.
"Let us do good to all people. GALATIANS 6:10" NIV.
We can serve God wherever we are.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 6 "Little Maid Serves God"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 6 "Little Maid Serves God"
media:group.media:description:
Do you know how to serve God? Little Maid served God by what she did and said.
"May . . . God . . . strengthen you in every good deed and word." 2 THESSALONIANS 2:16, 17, NIV.
We serve God by what we do and say.
More at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 7 "Disappearing Spots"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 7 "Disappearing Spots"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever done something really nice for someone else just because you wanted to? Naaman had some people doing good deeds for him.
"For we are . . . created . . . to do good works." EPHESIANS 2:10, NIV.
We serve God by doing good for others.
More at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten www.vimeo.com/sabbathschool iPhone/iPad and Android app: Sabbath School

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 8 "Naaman Serves God"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 8 "Naaman Serves God"
media:group.media:description:
What things are very important to you? Your family? Your friends? What about God? Why did Naaman say that God was the true God?
"Now I know that there is no God in all the world except in Israel." 2 KINGS 5:15, NIV.
We serve others, but we put God first.
more at www.gracelink.net

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 9 "Baby Moses"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 9 "Baby Moses"
media:group.media:description:
Do you know you have angels watching you all the time? Baby Moses had angels watching him.
"You are my hiding place." PSALM 32:7, NIV.
We worship God when we thank Him.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 10 "Pillars Of Cloud And Fire"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 10 "Pillars Of Cloud And Fire"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever been lost? The Israelites didn't get lost, because they had two things to lead them.
"I am with you and will watch over you wherever you go." GENESIS 28:15, NIV.
We thank God for taking good care of us.
More at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten or download our iPhone/iPad or Android app. The app is called "Sabbath School"

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 11 "Bitter Water To Better Water"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 11 "Bitter Water To Better Water"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever been thirsty? Really, really thirsty? The children of Israel thought they might die of thirst.
"He will lead them to springs of living water." REVELATION 7:17, NIV.
We thank God for giving us water.
more at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 12 "God Gives Manna"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 3 Episode 12 "God Gives Manna"
media:group.media:description:
Where do you get your food? From a store? An orchard or field? God gave the Israelites some unusual food.
"You will have plenty to eat . . . and you will praise the name of the Lord." JOEL 2:26, NIV
We thank God for giving us good food.
More at www.gracelink.net/kindergarten
